013package org.apache.juneau.junit.bct;
014
015import static org.apache.juneau.junit.bct.Utils.*;
016
017/**
018 * Exception thrown when a requested property cannot be found on an object.
019 *
020 * <p>This exception is typically thrown by {@link PropertyExtractor} implementations
021 * when attempting to access a property that does not exist on the target object.</p>
022 *
023 * <h5 class='section'>Examples:</h5>
024 * <p class='bjava'>
025 *   <jc>// Property extraction that may throw PropertyNotFoundException</jc>
026 *   <jk>try</jk> {
027 *      String <jv>value</jv> = <jv>converter</jv>.getNested(<jv>object</jv>, <jsm>tokenize</jsm>(<js>"nonExistentProperty"</js>).get(0));
028 *   } <jk>catch</jk> (PropertyNotFoundException <jv>e</jv>) {
029 *      <jc>// Handle missing property gracefully</jc>
030 *      System.<jsm>err</jsm>.println(<js>"Property not found: "</js> + <jv>e</jv>.getMessage());
031 *   }
032 * </p>
033 *
034 * <p class='bjava'>
035 *   <jc>// Testing for PropertyNotFoundException</jc>
036 *   <jsm>assertThrows</jsm>(PropertyNotFoundException.<jk>class</jk>, () -> {
037 *      <jv>converter</jv>.getNested(<jv>bean</jv>, <jsm>tokenize</jsm>(<js>"invalidField"</js>).get(0));
038 *   });
039 * </p>
040 */
041public class PropertyNotFoundException extends RuntimeException {
042
043   private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
044
045   /**
046    * Constructs a new PropertyNotFoundException with the specified detail message.
047    *
048    * @param message The detail message describing the missing property
049    */
050   public PropertyNotFoundException(String message) {
051      super(message);
052   }
053
054   /**
055    * Constructs a new PropertyNotFoundException with the specified detail message and cause.
056    *
057    * @param message The detail message describing the missing property
058    * @param cause The underlying cause of the exception
059    */
060   public PropertyNotFoundException(String message, Throwable cause) {
061      super(message, cause);
062   }
063
064   /**
065    * Constructs a new PropertyNotFoundException for a specific property name and object type.
066    *
067    * @param propertyName The name of the property that could not be found
068    * @param objectType The type of object on which the property was sought
069    */
070   public PropertyNotFoundException(String propertyName, Class<?> objectType) {
071      super(f("Property ''{0}'' not found on object of type {1}", propertyName, objectType.getSimpleName()));
072   }
073
074   /**
075    * Constructs a new PropertyNotFoundException for a specific property name and object type with a cause.
076    *
077    * @param propertyName The name of the property that could not be found
078    * @param objectType The type of object on which the property was sought
079    * @param cause The underlying cause of the exception
080    */
081   public PropertyNotFoundException(String propertyName, Class<?> objectType, Throwable cause) {
082      super(f("Property ''{0}'' not found on object of type {1}", propertyName, objectType.getSimpleName()) ,cause);
083   }
084}
